```{r 3.}
calculate_fibonacci <- function(limit) {

  a <- 0
  b <- 1
  
  cat(a, " ")
  cat(b, " ")
  
  repeat {

    next_number <- a + b
    
    if (next_number > limit) {
      break  
    }
    
    cat(next_number, " ")
    
    a <- b
    b <- next_number
  }
}

user_input <- as.numeric(readline("Enter the starting number for the Fibonacci sequence: "))

if (!is.na(user_input) && user_input > 0) {
  calculate_fibonacci(500)
} else {
  cat("Invalid input. Please enter a valid positive number.\n")
}

```
